name: Ascii Puzzle
description:
You are a @ and your mission is to complete all of the puzzles

Controlls

To move block, open doors and speak to @'s, just go next to the thing you want to interact with, and press to the direction you want to interact.

Movement W, A, S, D and / or  arrow keys.  Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

In this jam our theme was Words. The restriction for the jam was to make a game where everything is composed from text, UI, levels and everything. I went with the uncreative idea of making a game with ascii art.
